description: If you are a die-hard spice fan, try adding a pinch of garam masala.

default: ¼ green chilli, seeded and sliced (optional), or pinch of red chilli powder

steps: Heat the oil and butter in a small non-stick frying pan. Add the onion and fry for about four minutes, until soft.
Beat together the rest of the ingredients in a bowl and pour into the pan and scramble as normal. Take them off the heat when they are cooked to your taste. Serve with toast or naan bread.
title: Indian scrambled eggs
